channel.title: Data on Privalko Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Data on Privalko Blog

item.title: Poverty, shoes, and Rosstat
item.description: Rosstat, Russia’s main authority on state figures, recently released a summary of poverty and deprivation. One of the main findings suggests that 33% of households cannot afford two pairs of seasonally appropriate shoes for everyone in the home. A few publications picked up on the finding, and the Kremlin supposedly rejects the body’s figures.. Generally, Russia’s wages are famously low the median hourly wage works out at roughly 0.91 net per hour in British pounds.
